statements: UPDATE insurance_quotes SET age = 25, risk_factor = 3 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE insurance_quotes SET gender = 'Female', age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE insurance_quotes SET risk_factor = 3 WHERE customer_id = 12345
UPDATE insurance_quotes SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE insurance_customers SET name='John Doe', age=35 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE risk_assessment_data SET risk_score=80, risk_factor='High' WHERE assessment_id=3;
UPDATE insurance_customers SET age = 35, address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE risk_assessment_data SET risk_score = 80, risk_factor = 'High Risk' WHERE assessment_id = 2002;
UPDATE Quotes SET risk_factor = 0.8 WHERE quote_id = 101;
UPDATE RiskAssessmentData SET risk_score = 0.6, risk_description = 'High risk of flooding' WHERE data_id = 201;
UPDATE Quotes SET base_premium = 1500.00 WHERE quote_id = 1001;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 2002;
UPDATE customers SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE risk_assessment SET risk_score = 80, assessment_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE assessment_id = 201
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
